extractions.content: On every new chat, the AI must:
- [ ] Enhanced error visibility and logging in dashboard (error aggregation, recent errors panel)
- [ ] Add logs viewer to dashboard (recent logs panel with filtering)
- [ ] Service status dashboard (all services + ports + health)
- [ ] Run content through AI detection tools
- [ ] Install AnimateDiff or Stable Video Diffusion
- [ ] Only run when requested or BOOTSTRAP state
- [ ] Set up Python FastAPI backend structure
- [ ] Set up Git repository with proper .gitignore
- [ ] Create system requirement checker (GPU, RAM, OS)
- [ ] Database schema for models (name, type, path, size, downloaded)
- [ ] Model cards with metadata (size, quality, type)
- [ ] Test model downloads (start with small models)
- [ ] Set up ComfyUI or Automatic1111 API connection
- [ ] Database schema for characters (name, bio, face_embeddings)
- [ ] Test image generation with face consistency
- [ ] Integrate Kling AI 2.5 or Stable Video Diffusion
- [ ] **T-20250115-005** - Enhanced error visibility and logging in dashboard (error aggregation, recent errors panel)
- [ ] **T-20250115-006** - Add logs viewer to dashboard (recent logs panel with filtering)
- [ ] **T-20250115-005** - Enhanced error visibility and logging in dashboard (error aggregation, recent errors panel)
- [ ] Frontend: add error aggregation panel to dashboard
- [ ] Evidence: list changed files + test commands/results
